Source.Name: cheese
Source.Description: Cheese is a webcam application that uses your webcam to take photos and videos, apply fancy special effects and share fun with others.
Kameranızdan fotoğraf çekin, video kayıt edin ve efektler ekleyin.

Package.Name: cheese-docs
Package.Summary: Help files and API documents for cheese library

Source.Name: js185
Source.Description: Spidermonkey est l'Implémentation C de Javascript par Mozilla.
Spidermonkey is Mozilla's C implementation of JavaScript.
Mozilla'nın Javascript'in C implementasyonu.
Spidermonkey es la implementación de JavaScript con C de Mozilla.

Source.Name: muffin
Source.Description: Cinnamon masaüstünün pencere uygulamasıdır.
Cinnamon masaüstünün pencere uygulamasıdır..

Source.Name: cinnamon-screensaver
Source.Description: cinnamon-screensaver is a screen saver and locker.

Source.Name: cinnamon-settings-daemon
Source.Summary: The daemon sharing settings from CINNAMON to GTK+/KDE applications
Source.Description: A daemon to share settings from CINNAMON to other applications. It also handles global keybindings, and many of desktop-wide settings.

Source.Name: cinnamon-control-center
Source.Summary: Utilities to configure the Cinnamon desktop
Source.Description: This package contains configuration utilities for the Cinnamon desktop, which allow to configure accessibility options, desktop fonts, keyboard and mouse properties, sound setup, desktop theme and background, user interface properties, screen resolution, and other settings.

Source.Name: cinnamon-desktop
Source.Summary: The cinnamon-desktop package contains an internal library (libcinnamondesktop) used to implement some portions of the CINNAMON desktop
The cinnamon-desktop package contains an internal library (libcinnamondesktop) used to implement some portions of the CINNAMON desktop
Source.Description: The cinnamon-desktop package contains an internal library (libcinnamondesktop) used to implement some portions of the CINNAMON desktop, and also some data files and other shared components of the CINNAMON user environment.

The cinnamon-desktop package contains an internal library (libcinnamondesktop) used to implement some portions of the CINNAMON desktop, and also some data files and other shared components of the CINNAMON user environment.

Source.Name: cjs-internals
Source.Description: Cjs allows using Cinnamon libraries from Javascript. It's based on the Spidermonkey Javascript engine from Mozilla and the GObject introspection framework.

Source.Name: cinnamon
Source.Summary: Gnome Shell çatallaması gnome2 görünümlü Cinnamon masaüstü
Gnome Shell çatallaması gnome2 görünümlü Cinnamon masaüstü.
Source.Description: Cinnamon, Gnome Shell çatallaması gnome2 görünümlü Cinnamon masaüstü.
Cinnamon, Gnome Shell çatallaması gnome2 görünümlü Cinnamon masaüstü.

Source.Name: cinnamon-translations
Source.Description: Cinnamon localization package.
Cinnamon yerelleştirme paketi.

Source.Name: cinnamon-session
Source.Description: The Cinnamon Session Handler.

Source.Name: nemo
Source.Description: Nemo is the file manager and graphical shell for the Cinnamon desktop that makes it easy to manage your files and the rest of your system.

Source.Name: nemo-extensions
Source.Summary: The daemon sharing settings from CINNAMON to GTK+/KDE applications
Source.Description: A daemon to share settings from CINNAMON to other applications. It also handles global keybindings, and many of desktop-wide settings.

Source.Name: cinnamon-settings-daemon
Source.Summary: The daemon sharing settings from CINNAMON to GTK+/KDE applications
Source.Description: A daemon to share settings from CINNAMON to other applications. It also handles global keybindings, and many of desktop-wide settings.

Source.Name: clutter-gst2
Source.Description: clutter-gst provides GStreamer interface for clutter.
clutter-gst2 clutter için GStreamer arabirimi sunar.

Source.Name: caribou
Source.Summary: Caribou is a text entry and UI navigation application being developed as an alternative to the Gnome On-screen Keyboard.
Source.Description: Caribou is a text entry and UI navigation application being developed as an alternative to the Gnome On-screen Keyboard. The overarching goal for Caribou is to create a usable solution for people whose primary way of accessing a computer is a switch device.

Source.Name: nautilus
Source.Summary: Default file manager for the GNOME desktop
GNOME masasütü için öntanımlı dosya yöneticisi
Source.Description: Nautilus is a file manager that allows to browse directories, preview files and launch applications.
Nautilus; dizinlerde gezinmeyi, dosyaları gözatmayı ve uygulamalar başlatmayı sağlayan bir dosya yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: totem-pl-parser
Source.Description: Totem is a library that parse and save playlists, as used in music and movie players.
Totem; müzik ve video oynatıcıları tarafından kullanılan, çokluortam oynatma listelerini ayrıştıran ve kaydeden bir kütüphanedir.

Source.Name: libgnome-keyring
Source.Description: libgnome-keyring is a library that used by applications to integrate with the gnome-keyring system.
libgnome-keyring, gnome-keyring sistemine uyumlu olmak için programlar tarafından kullanılan bir kütüphanedir.

Source.Name: gnome3-desktop
Source.Description: gnome-desktop contains basic GNOME libraries and information applications.
gnome-desktop, GNOME kullanıcı ortamının paylaşımlı bileşenlerini içeren temel pakettir.

Source.Name: gnome-online-accounts
Source.Description: The GNOME Online Accounts package contains a framework used to access the user's online accounts.

Source.Name: gnome-common
Source.Summary: Common files for development of GNOME packages
GNOME uygulamalarının geliştirmede kullandığı yaygın dosyalar
Source.Description: gnome-common package contains aclocal macros, makefile headers and documents tools in order to build GNOME sources.

Source.Name: gnome-js-common
Source.Description: The GNOME JS Common package provides common modules for GNOME JavaScript bindings.

Source.Name: gdm
Source.Description: GDM provides log into different sessions on local or remote machines.

Source.Name: zenity
Source.Description: Zenity is the GNOME port of dialog which allows you to display dialog boxes from the commandline and shell scripts.
Zenity, komut satırından ve betiklerle iletişim kutuları oluşturmanıza imkan verir. Dialog'un Gnome 3 için yeniden yazılmış halidir.

Source.Name: gnome-menus
Source.Description: gnome-menus has got desktop-directories, GNOME menus library and its python bindings.

Update.Comment: Move pc files to devel pack, rebuild
Update.Name: Osman Erkan

Source.Name: seed
Source.Description: Javascript bindings for Webkit-GTK and GNOME libraries.

Source.Name: gnome-keyring
Source.Description: The gnome-keyring session daemon manages passwords and other types of secrets for the user, storing them encrypted with a main password. Applications can use the gnome-keyring library to integrate with the keyring.

Source.Name: gnome-bluetooth
Source.Description: gnome-bluetooth is a fork of bluez-gnome focused on integration with GNOME.
gnome-bluetooth, bluez-gnome'un Gnome masaüstüne entegre edilmesine odaklanmış bir çatallamasıdır.

Source.Name: mutter
Source.Summary: A window manager which is replacing Metacity
Metacity'nin yerine geçen bir pencere yöneticisi
Source.Description: Mutter is the window manager for which GNOME Shell is a plugin in GNOME 3, replacing Metacity.
Mutter, Gnome 3'de Metacity'nin yerine geçen bir pencere yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: libgweather
Source.Description: libgweather is a library to access weather information from online services for numerous locations.

Source.Name: accountsservice
Source.Summary: D-Bus Service to Manipulate User Account Information
Source.Description: accountsservice server provides a set of D-Bus interfaces for querying and manipulating user account information.

Source.Name: gnome-session
Source.Description: gnome-session manages X11-compliant sessions with ConsoleKit daemon and starts GNOME core services
gnome-session, ConsoleKit ile birlikte X11-uyumlu oturumları yönetir ve temel GNOME servislerini başlatır.

Source.Name: gnome-shell
Source.Summary: GNOME Shell is the defining technology of the GNOME 3 user experience
Source.Description: GNOME Shell is the defining technology of the GNOME 3 user experience. It provides core interface functions like switching to windows and launching applications.
gnome-shell, Gnome 3 kullanıcı tecrübesinin belirleyici teknolojisidir. Pencereler arası geçiş ve uygulama çalıştırma gibi temel işlevleri sağlar.

Source.Name: gnome-themes-standard
Source.Description: gnome-themes-standard provides GNOME Standart Themes.
gnome-themes-standard, GNOME3'ün standart temalarını içerir.

Source.Name: gnome-settings-daemon
Source.Summary: System settings daemon for GNOME desktop
Source.Description: gnome-settings-daemon shares GNOME specific settings with other applications via DBus connection.

Source.Name: libwacom
Source.Summary: This project manages the libraries, configuration, and diagnostic tools for Wacom tablets running under Linux.
Source.Description: This project manages the libraries, configuration, and diagnostic tools for Wacom tablets running under Linux. It also maintains updated Linux kernel drivers and Xorg/XFree86 XInput drivers.

Source.Name: gnome-video-effects
Source.Description: gnome-video-effects is a collection of GStreamer effects.
gnome-video-effects, Gstreamer efektlerinin derlemelerini içerir.

Source.Name: folks
Source.Summary: A library that aggregates people from multiple sources
Source.Description: folks is a library that aggregates people from multiple sources.

Source.Name: yelp
Source.Description: Yelp is a help viewer which serves as a DocBook viewer, a man page viewer, and an info page viewer.
Yelp DocBook, man sayfaları ve info sayfaları için bir yardım belgeleri görüntüleyicidir.

Source.Name: libgee-8
Source.Description: libgee is a collection library providing GObject-based interfaces and classes for commonly used data structures.

Source.Name: libgnomekbd
Source.Description: libgnomekbd contains a GNOME library that manages keyboard layout settings and its panel applet.

Source.Name: gnome-control-center
Source.Description: gnome-control-center is GNOME's main interface for configuration of various aspects of your GNOME desktop.
gnome-control-center GNOME masaüstünüzün çeşitli ayarlarını değiştiren, GNOME'un ana arayüzüdür.

Source.Name: geocode-glib
Source.Summary: GLib geocoding library that uses the Yahoo! Place Finder service
Source.Description: geocode-glib is a convenience library for the geocoding (finding longitude, and latitude from an address) and reverse geocoding (finding an address from coordinates). It uses Nominatim service to achieve that.

Source.Name: gnome-panel
Source.Description: GNOME panel is located in the edge of screen that provides contains widgets such as application launcher, cpu monitor and workspace switcher.
GNOME paneli ekranın kenarlarında bulunur ve programcıkları (işlemci yükü, program başlatıcısı, çalışma alanı değiştiricisi gibi) barındırmayı sağlar.

Source.Name: gnome-screenshot
Source.Description: gnome-screenshot lets you take pictures of your screen.
gnome-screenshot GNOME'un resmi ekran koruyucusudur.

Source.Name: gnome-terminal
Source.Summary: Terminal emulation application for the GNOME desktop.
GNOME masaüstü için terminal emülasyon uygulaması
Source.Description: GNOME terminal is a emulation application that designed to run xterm, VT102 and VT220
GNOME terminal; xterm, VT102 xterm ile çalışacak şekilde tasarlanan bir terminal emülasyon uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: gnome-contacts
Source.Description: gnome-contacts includes both a GNOME-wide contacts framework that can be used by different applications as well as a dedicated contacts application.
gnome-contacts, kendi başına iletişim bilgilerini organize etmek için kullanılabileceği gibi, başka uygulamalar tarafından da aynı amaç için kullanılabilen bir haberleşme çatısıdır.

Source.Name: gnome-backgrounds
Source.Description: The GNOME Backgrounds package contains a collection of graphics files which can be used as backgrounds in the GNOME Desktop environment. Additionally, the package creates the proper framework and directory structure so that you can add your own files to the collection.

Source.Name: gnome-power-manager
Source.Description: GNOME Power Manager is a session daemon that acts as a policy agent on top of UPower.
GNOME güç yöneticisi, UPower kuralları üzerinden hareket eden bir ayar yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: gnome-system-monitor
Source.Description: gnome-system-monitor is a process viewer and system monitor for the GNOME desktop.
GNOME masaüstü için sistem ve süreç izleticisidir.

Source.Name: eog
Source.Description: Eog (Eye of GNOME) is the offical image viewer for the GNOME desktop.
Eog (GNOME'un gözü), GNOME masaüstü için resmi resim görüntüleyicisidir.

Source.Name: file-roller
Source.Description: File-manager is a archive manager that create, modify and extract various archive formats with compression support
File-roller çeşitli arşiv dosyalarını sıkıştırma desteği ile oluşturan, açan, düzenleyen bir arşiv yönetim uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: gnome-shell-extensions
Source.Summary: A collection of extensions providing additional and optional functionality to GNOME Shell
Gnome-shell'e seçimlik yeni işlevsellikler katan eklentiler seçkisi
Source.Description: gnome-shell-extensions is a collection of extensions providing additional and optional functionality to GNOME Shell.
gnome-shell-extensions, Gnome-shell'e seçimlik yeni işlevsellikler katan eklentilerin bir seçkisini sunar.

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-alternate-tab
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-alternate-tabe, Classic Alt+Tab behavior for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-apps-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-apps-menu, Application menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-auto-move-windows
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-auto-move-windows, Assign specific workspaces to applications in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-drive-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-drive-menu, Drive status menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-launch-new-instance
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-launch-new-instance, Always launch a new application instance for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-places-menu
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-places-menu, Places status menu for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-systemmonitor
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-systemmonitor, System Monitor for GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-user-theme
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-user-theme, Support for custom themes in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-window-list
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-windows-list, Display a window list at the bottom of the screen in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-windowsnavigator
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-windowsnavigator, Support for keyboard selection of windows and workspaces in GNOME Shell

Package.Name: gnome-shell-extensions-xrandr-indicator
Package.Summary: gnome-shell-extensions-xrandr-indicator, Xrandr indicator for GNOME Shell

Source.Name: libsocialweb
Source.Description: Folks is a library that aggregates people from multiple sources (eg, Telepathy connection managers and eventually Evolution Data Server, Facebook, etc.) to create metacontacts.
